characters.name: Cole
characters.appearance: Rugged male cowboy in his 30s-40s with a stocky, strong build. Weathered, sun-damaged skin with a distinctive scar on his chin. Black hair and black eyes. Full thick beard. Dressed in classic cowboy attire including duster coat, vest, boots with spurs, and earth-toned Western clothing.
characters.personality: Silent and mysterious. Commanding presence with minimal words. A lone drifter with purpose.
characters.role: The cowboy who claims the hat and becomes its owner, riding off into the dust storm

storyline.overview: A cinematic Western cowboy hat advertisement set in an abandoned town at high noon. A pristine brown rustic cowboy hat sits waiting on a post until Cole, a mysterious drifter, approaches and claims it as his own before riding off into a dramatic dust storm.
storyline.tone: Cinematic and dramatic with classic Western atmosphere
scenes: Opening shot: Pristine brown rustic cowboy hat sitting alone on a wooden post in an abandoned Western town at high noon, harsh sunlight casting shadows
The approach: Cole walks into frame, his boots kicking up dust as he notices the hat on the post
The claiming: Close-up as Cole reaches out and picks up the hat, examining it briefly before placing it on his head with confidence
The ride: Cole mounts his horse and rides off as a dramatic dust storm begins to swirl around him
Closing: Cole disappears as a silhouette into the dust storm, hat visible on his head as he fades into the dramatic weather
